RO_0002429 - involved in positive regulation of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for involved in positive regulation of

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    c involved in regulation of p if c is involved in some p' and p' positively regulates some p


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
